message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,150,000. I believe this is a fair offer considering the benefits it will bring to your business.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,050,000. I believe this is a fair price considering my budget and the value I see in the product.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. However, the value of this product is truly significant, and $1,150,000 is already a competitive price.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,100,000. This is my final offer, as I have other interested buyers.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1,050,000, which is the maximum I'm willing to go. I'm hoping we can meet at this price.
